BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland Survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the harsh wasteland, learning to fight for survival from an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed the dangers of uncontrolled technology and lawless raiders, which shaped [PAWN_possessive] worldview. When the Brotherhood recruited [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_pronoun] found purpose in their disciplined military structure.

BackstoryDef.title: Head Paladin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the Brotherhood's Head Paladin, commanding all military operations. [PAWN_pronoun] is known for [PAWN_possessive] strict interpretation of the Codex and unwavering dedication to the Brotherhood's isolationist policies. [PAWN_pronoun] believes outsiders are dangerous and that the Brotherhood must remain pure and separate from the wasteland's chaos.

BackstoryDef.title: Scholar's Apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed exceptional intellectual aptitude from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was fascinated by pre-war technology and spent countless hours in the Brotherhood's archives, reading everything [PAWN_pronoun] could find. The elder scribes recognized [PAWN_possessive] potential and provided advanced training in scientific methods and technological analysis.

BackstoryDef.title: Head Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the Brotherhood's Head Scribe, leading all research and documentation efforts. [PAWN_pronoun] conducted groundbreaking research on super mutants and wrote detailed reports on [PAWN_possessive] findings. [PAWN_possessive] work is meticulous and [PAWN_pronoun] believes knowledge and understanding are the Brotherhood's greatest weapons.

BackstoryDef.title: Library Helper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up surrounded by books and holotapes in the Brotherhood's extensive library. [PAWN_pronoun] helped organize and catalog materials from an early age, developing a deep appreciation for the preservation of knowledge. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to read multiple pre-war languages and became skilled at deciphering damaged texts.

BackstoryDef.title: Master Librarian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the chief librarian at Lost Hills, managing the Brotherhood's vast collection of pre-war knowledge. [PAWN_pronoun] is the go-to expert for finding specific information and has memorized the location of thousands of documents. [PAWN_pronoun] takes great pride in helping others access the information they need.

BackstoryDef.title: Military Brat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a Brotherhood military family and raised with strict discipline. [PAWN_pronoun] trained in combat from childhood, learning to handle weapons and wear power armor. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in physical training and showed natural leadership abilities that impressed [PAWN_possessive] instructors.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Paladin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned the rank of Paladin through dedication and combat prowess. [PAWN_pronoun] serves as a guard within Lost Hills and participates in field operations when needed. [PAWN_pronoun] is respected by [PAWN_possessive] peers for [PAWN_possessive] reliability and commitment to the Brotherhood's mission.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Recruit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited into the Brotherhood as a young child after showing promise. [PAWN_pronoun] underwent basic training and education, learning the Brotherhood's values and principles. [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard to prove [PAWN_pronoun] belonged, eager to advance through the ranks and serve the organization.

BackstoryDef.title: Gate Guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as an Initiate guarding the entrance to Lost Hills. [PAWN_pronoun] is responsible for screening visitors and protecting the base from threats. Though still low in rank, [PAWN_pronoun] takes [PAWN_possessive] duties seriously and dreams of one day becoming a full Paladin.

BackstoryDef.title: Security Detail
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up learning the importance of vigilance and protection. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to identify threats and respond quickly to danger. [PAWN_possessive] instructors noted [PAWN_possessive] sharp reflexes and ability to remain calm under pressure.

BackstoryDef.title: Entrance Paladin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned the rank of Paladin and was assigned to guard the entrance to Lost Hills alongside other defenders. [PAWN_pronoun] has proven [PAWN_objective]self in combat and is trusted to be the first line of defense against any threats to the Brotherhood's primary base.

BackstoryDef.title: West Coast Wanderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth traveling the West Coast with [PAWN_possessive] Brotherhood family. [PAWN_pronoun] learned about the various settlements and factions, developing an understanding of the wasteland beyond Lost Hills. This experience gave [PAWN_objective] a broader perspective than many Brotherhood members.

BackstoryDef.title: Senior Paladin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose to the rank of Senior Paladin and was assigned to the Brotherhood outpost in San Francisco. [PAWN_pronoun] helps maintain Brotherhood interests on the frontier while keeping contact with Lost Hills. [PAWN_possessive] experience and rank make [PAWN_objective] a valuable asset to the organization.

BackstoryDef.title: Technical Prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed exceptional technical aptitude from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] could disassemble and repair complex devices with ease, impressing the Brotherhood's scribes. [PAWN_pronoun] received specialized training in technology and recruitment assessment.

BackstoryDef.title: Recruitment Officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a Scribe in the Brotherhood's San Francisco outpost, focusing on recruitment efforts. [PAWN_pronoun] evaluates potential recruits and determines if they have the skills and dedication the Brotherhood needs. [PAWN_possessive] assessment abilities have brought many valuable members into the organization.
